name: Grave Robin
pitch: Top Down Stealth Game for Robin Graves
content:
I helped create this game during a Ludum Dare Game jam over an insane weekend of Night Shifts and Finals.
I had the fortune of working on this with my good friends Troy Sanders and Dayton Murphy...

Devistatingly, Dayton is no longer with us.
This game was made in flashpunk
This game was made... for you

name: LICH
pitch: Climb the ranks of game development...As a Lich
content:
Lich is a topdown minion-adventure made in GameMaker.
This game was made in conjuction with a team of 3 others: Adam Ruef, Kristopher Fournier, and Courtney Schwark.
THE STORY:
Working as a lowly mail-boy in the basement of a successful Game Studio,
your dream of blossoming into a beautiful game developer looks pretty dim, UNTIL!!!
Down the shoot comes the first chapter to a book: THE NECRONOMICON.
You read the pages and transform into a MOST awesome Lv:1 Lich.
From there you venture your way to the top as you find the missing chapters,
gain IMPRESSIVE Lich powers, obtain POWERFUL minions and become one STELLAR Game Developing Lich.
This game was made... for you

name: Cardiac Arrest
pitch: Run away with your heart in this Dynamic platformer from the police who want to arrest you.
content:
Cardiac Arrest is a game made at the GLOBAL GAME JAM
I made this game over a weekend with:TROY SANDERS, PETER BARTOSCH and ADAM SCHULTZ.
For this game I helped design as well as create the Music/Sound Effects.
(UNFORTUNATELY, with the huge time constraint, we weren't able to implement most of the content)
This game was made using UNITY PRO
This game was made... for you

name: NO_EXPANSION
content:
NO_EXPANTION is a pixelated survivor-horror game.
This was a 2-month solo project I took on to better understand/manage all aspects of what it takes to complete a full game.
To make NO_EXPANSION I utilized:
PROGRAMMING: FLASHPUNK, Flashdevelop
AUDIO: Cubase, Soundforge, Audacity
VISUALS: Photoshop, Microsoft Paint
The game ended up as a two-level explorer, but the knowledge gained from this project far exceeded the proverbial 'two-levels'.
This is a FLASH game made in flashpunk
This game was made... for you

name: Life Is A Party
pitch: Live out your short life and make it the best bleeping party you can.
content:
'Live life like it's a party! ...cause it is. It is a party.'
This game is a proof of concept made on the side of life for a Game Competition #AdventureJam2016

name: Audible Bits
pitch: A puzzle game I actually enjoy playing
content:
Audible Bits is a timed based puzzle game featuring dynamic color/Sound Manipulation.
Tap away your sorrows by destroying your colorful world to a melodous tune.
Beat your friend's high scores in 2 differnt play modes and demand the mad props you deserve.
This game was made... for you

name: Tale Of Swords
content:
Tale of Swords is a re-imagined take on the legend of the nine-tailed fox.
Hack n' slash your way through this feudal-Japan inspired world infused with the terror of advanced robotics.
You are the embodiment of the nine-tailed fox. Each weapon represents one of your tails.
You must reclaim each weapon by slicing your way through hordes of enemies in order to reclaim each sword and become The Wielder.
This game was made in flashpunk
This game was made... for you

name: Apple A Day: Intro
pitch: Text-Based Survivor Horror featuring dynamic Audio
content: <iframe width='100%' height='400px' src='https://www.youtube.com/embed/uzFcv1XouIw' frameborder='0' allow='autoplay; encrypted-media' allowfullscreen></iframe>

This story was created Twine. It was the successful collaberation of a bunch of my javascript experiements
and was propelled by the Brilliance that is Twine.
Only issue with copious custom Javascript libraries on a web platform is... compatability.
From the start I set the goal of making this targeted on (Desktop) Chrome only.

name: Interdenominational BROwS
pitch: The Multiplayer Love child of a 2D Top-down farming simulator and a 3D First-Person Shooter
content:
P1 has been neglecting the Flower God. With the help of his interdenominational friend, P2, harvest the flowerbeds of the nearby AngryPeep Garden.
If you’re lucky, you will have enough flowers to appease the Flower God.
This game was made... for you

name: CapyBarbra: A New Brow
pitch: Save the world in a very round about way as an adorable Capybara
content:
You are a Capybara and you're our only hope.

Help a fellow get back his self confidence by chewing off the eyebrow hairs sprouting all up in the space between his 2 predominate brows (Uni-brow territory).
Put him back at full confidence and maybe… just maybe… he can salvage his relationship and save Milk Chocolate for EVERYBODY!
(This will probably make more sense after a play…)

name: SLAP HAPPY
pitch: You are the new Slap Elder
content:
You are the child of a slap elder. That is, a slap elder with crazy messed up hands (the kind of messed up that can only come from a lifetime of slapping).
He comes to you for your help. As an aspiring hand model, you know that helping him will totally jack up your lil mitts.

Will you SACRIFICE your gorgeous mitts for the happiness of everyone you know?
This game was made... for you

name: Shelldon Makes a Home
pitch: Play as a Hermit crab at the muse of an excited narrator
content:
It's a hermit eat hermit world out there (looking at you introverts), and Shelldon is doing his best to survive.
Collect shells to build your house.
This game was made... for you
